name: Master of Masters!
description:
Face the horrors of social interaction with your antisocial, assertive and stoic maid-to-be protagonist, make friends with (or smooch and master!) your very weird, quirky masters and uncover the legend of the wisteria tree!

> 2 Prologue ends, 4 Route ends for a total of 6! (Romantic and Platonic)

> 7 CGs! (only 3 are reachable at the moment)

> Around 4k words! (please wait a day for an update!) (i got sick near the end of the jam and lost a bunch of time (skill issues))

> Unfunny jokes (by me!)

> 2 Hot masters to choose from

> ...And many more planned to be added in the future!

And your older brother...

...And many more planned!

Credits:

Pete, inspired by Peardude's "Uzadere Master" on CAI

Viktor, inspired by Deceiver's "Dorodere Master" on CAI

"So far" by Tinymemory

"At the calm summer seaside" by  蒲鉾さちこ
"Dramatic-City" by  蒲鉾さちこ
"The kind heart,Heart warming day" by  蒲鉾さちこ

"The sunset breathes" by Crep

"思い出の公園" by かずち


(DISCLAIMER!! Although the characters are inspired by CAI characters, no dialogue was generated by AI. I simply enjoyed their characters, admittedly, a bit too much. Permissions were granted.)
